components.description:
A golden ball, split in two halves in a shower of multicolored confetti and streamers.

Like ðŸŽ‰ Party Popper, commonly used to convey congratulations and celebration, as on New Year’s Eve, birthdays, wedding days, graduations, and other special occasions or good times more generally.

Its design across platforms—and inclusion in early sets from au by KDDI—suggest the emoji is a Japanese kusudama, a decorative ball used at such festive occasions as opening ceremonies.
components.title: Confetti Ball

description:
A golden ball, split in two halves in a shower of multicolored confetti and streamers.

Like ðŸŽ‰ Party Popper, commonly used to convey congratulations and celebration, as on New Year’s Eve, birthdays, wedding days, graduations, and other special occasions or good times more generally.

Its design across platforms—and inclusion in early sets from au by KDDI—suggest the emoji is a Japanese kusudama, a decorative ball used at such festive occasions as opening ceremonies.
title: Confetti Ball

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Celebration symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: Confetti Ball emoji: a ball containing confetti, burst open at celebrations such as New Yearâ€™s Eve or a Wedding in a celebratory manner. Con http://emojipedia.org/confetti-ball/
emoji_net_data.name: confetti ball

bn:00016988n: Formal performance of a solemn rite.
The public performance of a sacrament or solemn ceremony with all appropriate ritual
Performance of a ceremony (in an appropriate and solemn manner), such as performing a marriage.
The formal performance of a solemn rite, such as Christian sacrament

bn:00010679n: The date and year something was born.
The year, month, and day of someone's birth; date of birth
Date and year when something was born.
A birthday is a celebration of the anniversary of a person's birth.
The date on which someone is born or something is created, more commonly called birthdate or date of birth.
The date on which a person was born.
Day that comes once a year when a person celebrates the anniversary of his or her birth
A birthday is an occasion when a person or institution celebrates the anniversary of their birth.
The date on which a person was born

bn:00034150n: A day or period of time set aside for feasting and celebration

bn:00021739n: Small pieces or strips (streamers) of colored paper generally thrown about at festive occasions, especially at weddings
Small pieces of colored paper generally thrown about at festive occasions.
Small pieces or streamers of colored paper that are thrown around on festive occasions (as at a wedding)
Small pieces or streamers of paper, mylar, or metallic material which are usually thrown at parades and celebrations
Confetti are small pieces or streamers of plastic, mylar, or metallic material which are usually thrown at parades, FIFA World Cup winners, and celebrations, especially weddings.
